config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code is a method that returns the CSS media of the user agent. It first checks if the media is stored in the hints map, and if not, it falls back to the super class method to get the media.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the getMedia() method is called in the system. The frequency of triggering depends on how often this method is invoked in the code.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the configuration option is limited to the CSS media of the user agent. It does not have a significant impact on the overall system functionality.
